source: Twitter/X, OpenClaw showcase, ClawIndex, Reddit, community research

community_tools.name: Supermemory
community_tools.what: Gives OpenClaw unlimited long-term memory. Store and retrieve anything across all conversations.

community_tools.name: QMD Skill
community_tools.what: Cuts token usage by 95% — dramatically reduces AI API costs while maintaining quality.

community_tools.name: Phone Booth
community_tools.what: Lets your OpenClaw agent make and receive phone calls on your behalf.

community_tools.name: Beeper / Texts.blog
community_tools.what: Connect OpenClaw to all your messaging apps through one unified inbox (iMessage, Instagram DMs, etc).

community_tools.name: 1Password Skill
community_tools.what: Give OpenClaw its own secure vault — read and write passwords and secrets safely.

community_tools.name: Homey Integration
community_tools.what: Control your smart home — lights, temperature, locks — through OpenClaw via WhatsApp or Telegram.

community_tools.name: WHOOP Integration
community_tools.what: Pull your health metrics, recovery scores, and daily stats directly into your morning briefing.

community_tools.name: OpenAlgo
community_tools.what: Automate trading workflows and financial automations through OpenClaw.

community_tools.name: tldraw Integration
community_tools.what: Let your OpenClaw agent create and edit diagrams and visual workflows.

community_tools.name: Linear Integration
community_tools.what: Manage Linear issues, create tasks, and clean up your project boards through chat.

community_tools.name: Fastmail
community_tools.what: Connect Fastmail to OpenClaw for email management (alternative to Gmail/gog).

community_tools.name: Streamclaw
community_tools.what: Agentic streaming capabilities — agents that can stream content/data.

community_tools.name: Lobster.cash (Crossmint x Visa)
community_tools.what: Crypto payment infrastructure built on OpenClaw — Crossmint + Visa integration.

community_tools.name: ClawIndex
community_tools.what: The ecosystem directory for OpenClaw — 245+ projects, tools, and protocols building on OpenClaw.

real_showcase_examples.title: Full site rebuild from phone
real_showcase_examples.quote: Rebuilt my entire site via Telegram while watching Netflix in bed. Notion → Astro, 18 posts migrated, DNS moved to Cloudflare. Never opened my laptop.

real_showcase_examples.title: Business ops automation
real_showcase_examples.quote: Less than 24 hours in: cleaned up Linear issues, wrote email follow-ups, opened 3 PRs, prospected new signups.

real_showcase_examples.title: Morning executive briefing
real_showcase_examples.quote: Morning daily brief: weather, weekly objectives, health stats, meetings agenda, key reminders, trending topics, stuff I should read, a relevant quote from my books.

real_showcase_examples.title: Pre-meeting research
real_showcase_examples.quote: Researches people before meetings and creates briefing docs.

real_showcase_examples.title: Invoice creation
real_showcase_examples.quote: Creates invoices and summarizes work beautifully.

real_showcase_examples.title: AI calendar management
real_showcase_examples.quote: Timeblocks tasks in my calendar based on importance and urgency. Manages calendar conflicts autonomously.

real_showcase_examples.title: Business idea research
real_showcase_examples.quote: Spawns background sub-agents to research business ideas.

real_showcase_examples.title: Full smart home + health + comms
real_showcase_examples.quote: Built a website from my phone in minutes and connected WHOOP to quickly check my metrics and daily habits — on a Raspberry Pi.

real_showcase_examples.title: Gmail + calendar morning rollup
real_showcase_examples.quote: Creates a rollup in the morning so you can get an overview of any calendar events or emails you received overnight. Set how often it runs, how many events/emails to show.

real_showcase_examples.title: Automated deployment debugging
real_showcase_examples.quote: Got BigC to check a Railway deployment — builds failed — BigC reviewed the logs, identified root cause (incorrect build commands), updated configs automatically.

hardware_options.name: Mac mini M4
hardware_options.notes: Best for SA. Load shedding resistant with UPS. Full privacy. Native OpenClaw install.

hardware_options.name: Mac mini M4 Pro
hardware_options.notes: Overkill for OpenClaw alone, but future-proofs for local AI models (Ollama).

hardware_options.name: Raspberry Pi 5
hardware_options.notes: Ultra low cost hardware option. Community confirmed working. Very power efficient.
hardware_options.community_quote: I just finished setting up OpenClaw on my Raspberry Pi with Cloudflare — feels magical.

hardware_options.name: Any VPS (cloud)
hardware_options.notes: No hardware needed. Best for those without load shedding concerns or wanting zero upfront cost.
